description:
exp/types: Use build.FindTree in GcImporter

Fixes issue 2932

messages.text:
*** Submitted as 3ec5c69a7f86 ***

exp/types: Use build.FindTree in GcImporter

Fixes issue 2932

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046

Committer: Robert Griesemer <gri@golang.org>

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-devs@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, gri@golang.org, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go
File src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go (left):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go#oldcode44
src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go:44: 
please leave the empty line

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go#oldcode53
src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go:53: 
please leave the empty line

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go
File src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go#newcode28
src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go:28: pkgRoot = filepath.Join(runtime.GOROOT(), "pkg", runtime.GOOS+"_"+runtime.GOARCH)
this is not needed anymore

http://codereview.appspot.com/5654046/diff/3001/src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go#newcode43
src/pkg/exp/types/gcimporter.go:43: // "x" -> "$GOROOT/pkg/$GOOS_$GOARCH/x.ext", "x"
this can go now

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

> this is not needed anymore

I'm fairly sure you're referring to pkgRoot here. It's moved in the test file, so I've just constructed it ther.e
